summary: This is a calendar invitation for a video hearing regarding the removal proceedings for Ghislaine Maxwell, scheduled for July 2, 2020, at 3:30 p.m. It contains standard court notices prohibiting recording and restricting attendance to necessary case participants.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the removal hearing referenced in the document title and body.

persons.name: Kathleen DuPont
persons.context: Listed as the organizer of the calendar event for the hearing.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Removal Hearing
events.description: A court hearing regarding removal proceedings for defendant Ghislaine Maxwell, to be conducted via video conference.

keyFacts: A removal hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for July 2, 2020, at 3:30 p.m.
The hearing was to be conducted via secure video conference (ZoomGov), with attendance restricted to necessary case participants.
The notice includes a standard court prohibition against photographing, broadcasting, or televising the remote proceedings.
